thread.title: Davos: Why Rwanda is a leader on gender pay

title: Davos: Why Rwanda is a leader on gender pay
text:
Davos: Why Rwanda is a leader on gender pay 10:02am EST - 01:50 
At 86% Rwanda has one of the highest levels of female labour force participation in the world, and it's likely to be held up as an example for others to follow , as Gender equality comes under the spotlight at   in Davos. Kate King reports.
